# Set up 
```{r}
#| label: packages and data 
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) #general use package 
library(lterdatasampler) #package of data sets 
library(NatParksPalettes)
data(pie_crab) #crab size data set 
```

# Exploratory data visualization 

```{r}
#| label: latitiude and size plot

#base layer: ggplot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, #dataset
       aes(x = latitude, # x-axis should be latitude, y-axis is crab size
           y = size, 
           color = site)) + 
  #first layer: point to represent individual crabs 
  geom_point() + 
  #changing colors to be different from default 
  scale_color_manual( 
    values = natparks.pals("Arches", n = 13, type = "continuous")) + 
  #adding theme 
  theme_minimal()
```
